title: (x) Does anyone know what these fonts are? / Vogue (1966), Adidas - Melior, Akkurat Mono {Andrew}
content: Hi, I've have a couple of fonts I'm trying to identify. The serif is from an advertisement in a 1966 Vogue and the Adidas one is from a recent brochure. Any help greatly appreciated!
author: Jenny C-C

comments.content: Melior and Akkurat Mono, I think, not quite sure why it isn't monospaced though.
